about_the_game:
Santa has heard that you have been a naughty soldier this year and he is coming with appropriate presents! Holiday DLC adds a touch of Holiday spirit with decorations, gifts and other surprises to the classic Beach Invasion 1944:
  • Decorations and holiday related items scattered around
  • Landing infantry wear santa hats
  • Grenades are replaced by cane candy
  • Tanks are now decorated with christmas lights
  • Supply boxes are replaced by gift boxes
  • Bomber plane is replaced by santa's sleigh

content_descriptors.notes: Death and minimal blood which can be turned off from settings
